languages.text: "Лорд-капитан! Прошу вас, скорее возвращайтесь на корабль! Приближается шторм, о котором я вас предупреждала. Вам не пережить его на поверхности планеты!"

traits.locale_text: [draft] начинается шторм, надо вернуться на корабль

languages.text: "Lord Captain! Please return to the ship! I urge you to hurry! The storm is coming, the one I warned you about. You can't survive it on the planet's surface!"
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан! Прошу вас, скорее возвращайтесь на корабль! Приближается шторм, о котором я вас предупреждала. Вам не пережить его на поверхности планеты!"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain! Please return to the ship! I urge you to hurry! The storm is coming, the one I warned you about. You can't survive it on the planet's surface!"
"Lord Captain! Please return to the ship! I urge you to hurry! The storm is coming, the one I warned you about. You can't survive it on the planet's surface!"
"Lord Captain! Please return to the ship! I urge you to hurry! The storm is coming, the one I warned you about. You can't survive it on the planet's surface!"
"Lord Captain! Please return to the ship! I urge you to hurry! The storm is coming, the one I warned you about. You can't survive it on the planet's surface!"
"Lord Captain! Please return to the ship! I urge you to hurry! The storm is coming, the one I warned you about. You can't survive it on the planet's surface!"

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン！船にお戻りください！お急ぎください。嵐が近づいています！警告申し上げた嵐です。惑星の地表にいては生き残れません！」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain! Please return to the ship! I urge you to hurry! The storm is coming, the one I warned you about. You can't survive it on the planet's surface!"

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン！船にお戻りください！お急ぎください。嵐が近づいています！警告申し上げた嵐です。惑星の地表にいては生き残れません！」

languages.text: “舰长大人！快回到船上！我请求您快点！风暴马上就要来了，就是我之前警告您的那场风暴！如果继续留在行星表面，您恐怕必死无疑！”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain! Please return to the ship! I urge you to hurry! The storm is coming, the one I warned you about. You can't survive it on the planet's surface!"

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人！快回到船上！我请求您快点！风暴马上就要来了，就是我之前警告您的那场风暴！如果继续留在行星表面，您恐怕必死无疑！”

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ! De grâce, regagnez le vaisseau immédiatement ! Faites vite ! La tempête dont je vous ai parlé approche à grands pas. Vous ne survivrez pas à la surface de la planète ! »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain! Please return to the ship! I urge you to hurry! The storm is coming, the one I warned you about. You can't survive it on the planet's surface!"

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ! De grâce, regagnez le vaisseau immédiatement ! Faites vite ! La tempête dont je vous ai parlé approche à grands pas. Vous ne survivrez pas à la surface de la planète ! »

languages.text: «¡Lord Capitán! ¡Tiene que volver a la nave! ¡Dese prisa! Se avecina la tormenta, la que había mencionado antes. ¡No podrá sobrevivir en la superficie del planeta!».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain! Please return to the ship! I urge you to hurry! The storm is coming, the one I warned you about. You can't survive it on the planet's surface!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Lord Capitán! ¡Tiene que volver a la nave! ¡Dese prisa! Se avecina la tormenta, la que había mencionado antes. ¡No podrá sobrevivir en la superficie del planeta!».

languages.text: "Lord Captain! Kehrt bitte zum Schiff zurück! Ich bitte Euch, beeilt Euch! Der Sturm kommt, der, vor dem ich Euch gewarnt habe. Ihr könnt ihn auf der Oberfläche des Planeten nicht überleben!"
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain! Please return to the ship! I urge you to hurry! The storm is coming, the one I warned you about. You can't survive it on the planet's surface!"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain! Kehrt bitte zum Schiff zurück! Ich bitte Euch, beeilt Euch! Der Sturm kommt, der, vor dem ich Euch gewarnt habe. Ihr könnt ihn auf der Oberfläche des Planeten nicht überleben!"

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan! Lütfen gemiye dönün! Acele etmenizi istirham ediyorum! Fırtına yaklaşıyor, sizi uyarmıştım. Gezegenin yüzeyinde fırtınaya yakalanırsanız sağ çıkamazsınız!"
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain! Please return to the ship! I urge you to hurry! The storm is coming, the one I warned you about. You can't survive it on the planet's surface!"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan! Lütfen gemiye dönün! Acele etmenizi istirham ediyorum! Fırtına yaklaşıyor, sizi uyarmıştım. Gezegenin yüzeyinde kalırsanız kurtulamazsınız!"
